de.ur.iw.navigame.data_download

Class UniversityAreas

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ur.iw.navigame.data_download.UniversityAreas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServletRequestHandler

    public class UniversityAreas
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServletRequestHandler
    Request Handler that can print a list of possible areas for maps to the client.

        public void handleRequest(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> params,

        Prints a list of areas to the client, possibly after downloading said list first.

        Parameters:

      • loadAreasFile

        public void loadAreasFile(J7Consumer<java.lang.String> onSuccess,
                 J7Consumer<java.lang.Void> onError)
        If the xmlareas file from the urwalking server already exists on this local server, it just reads the contents of it; otherwise, the file will be downloaded first.
        Parameters:
        onSuccess - success callback
        onError - error callback

        onError - error callback

      • readAndPrintAreasInfo

        private void readAndPrintAreasInfo(java.lang.String jsonContents,
                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Reads and prints the parts of the file that concern the university campus.
        Parameters:
        jsonContents - the area file contents.
        response - response that will receive the output / feedback.

      • readAreasFromFile

        public org.json.JSONArray readAreasFromFile(org.json.JSONObject fromFile)
        Reads data that concern the university campus and puts it in a json array, ignoring all other data in the file.
        Parameters:
        fromFile - the data of the original areas file
        Returns:
        JSONArray containing the areas of the university (ignoring all others)

      • buildAreasArray

        private org.json.JSONArray buildAreasArray(org.json.JSONArray uniAreasArray)
        Puts the data from the original xmlareas file in a more "focused" format for output.
        Parameters:
        uniAreasArray - original array in the xmlareas file.
        Returns:
        a new array in a {name: x, filename: y} format.

      • onDownloadError

        Sends an internal server error as a response.
        Parameters:
